TopicTitle: have to press slash to stop time warp (quick question)

Articles.Content:
Hello!


I don't know if I pressed a wrong button but now i have to press "SLASH" (/) to stop time warp. Did this change because it was always "escape". Couldn't find it in the options to change it...

 

Thx!

you can change it in main menu's settings -> input -> game -> stop timewarp. It can also be the same key that you use for something else. I always put it on X*, the same as cut throttle.

btw, escape is pause/menu by default.

* on german keyboards X and Z switched places in regard to us keyboards

Edited June 26, 2016 by MircoMars
Thx now i got it! The idea to put it on the same key as "cut throttle" is a nice idea
And yes, it used to be ESC, but it changed in the new version.
Slash also cancels timewarp when you're manually warping using the '<' and '>' keys, so that's the origin of this idea.  Works for me
